sections.changelog:
2.1.4 – August 14, 2025

  • Fix: Nestable elements restoring its data attributes on the builder since Bricks v2

2.1.3 – August 12, 2025

  • Improve: Conditional CSS loading now includes WooCommerce templates
  • Improve: Conditional CSS loading now includes Bricks components
  • Improve: Accessibility tags missing in Stories element
  • Fix: MultiOffCanvas element displaying an error at the console when having missing values

2.1.2 – August 6, 2025

  • Fix: Updater warning in the Add New Plugin page when being on localhost

2.1.1 – August 2, 2025

  • Fix: loading screen missing image if none is set

2.1 – July 19, 2025

  • New: Next UI compatibility with Bricks v2
  • New: Next UI customizable loading screen
  • Fix: OffCanvas builder preview in MultiOffCanvas element

2.0.4 – July 9, 2025

  • Improve: Expanded conditional CSS loading capabilities to include Bricks popup templates
  • Improve: Expanded conditional CSS loading capabilities to include the new Bricks section templates

2.0.2 – June 25, 2025

  • Improve: Expanded conditional CSS loading capabilities to include the Bricks post type on the front

2.0.1 – June 12, 2025

  • New: Control to disable the Before/After Image v2 animation at the builder
  • Improve: Added a control to disable the builder at Before/After Image v2 element
